attributes.action: Ensure NHS Dental treatment is available to every citizen locally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NHS dental treatment is a right to taxpayers of this country not a privilege.
We demand that all towns in this country have a NHS dental centre available to everyone who requires it. It us unacceptable to be sent to an emergency dentist up to 50 miles away to recieve a choice of a temporary filling or an extraction. and then be forced into private dentistry for treatment. This service has already been paid for. Why should we pay twice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
